com.yantra.yfc.rcp

Class YRCPaginationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.YRCPaginationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class YRCPaginationException
extends java.lang.Exception
    Thrown when an application attempts to call pagination api getPage when either pagination is not supported on for that screen. An instance of this class can be thrown when
    • Pagination is not supported for that composite.
    • Pagination data is null .
    • When trying to call IYRCPageNavigator.showPreviousPage(YRCPaginationData) and the current page being shown is the first page.
    • When trying to call IYRCPageNavigator.showNextPage(YRCPaginationData) and the current page being shown is the last page.
    • When trying to call IYRCPageNavigator.gotoPage(YRCPaginationData, int) and the page number is either negative or greater than the total number of pages

    Applications should throw instances of this class to indicate illegal uses of the pagination api calls.

    See Also:
    IYRCPaginatedSearchAndListComposite, YRCPaginationNavigator, YRCPaginationData, Serialized Form
